booxboxJsonCalendarDesc: With the Google Calendar component you can simply select only the Calendar you want and set a specific date range relative to today, allowing your content to always stay relevant
booxboxJsonWeatherDesc: Include a seven day extended weather forecast in your presentation, including highs, lows, humidity, wind conditions and more. Pick from white, black or color icons
booxboxJsonInstagramDesc: Get live feed from your favorite Instagram account. Load data in real time and watch your posts come to life inside your digital signage presentation
booxboxJsonSheetsDesc: Easily link Scene labels to Google spreadsheet cells simply by specifying the column and row you want to link to, on the Google cloud spreadsheet. Very flexible, easy to add and even easier to edit
booxboxJsonDiggDesc: In one click add live content from Digg.com and keep your screen always fresh with live a feed that includes images and news
booxboxCreateDesign: Create your own design, simply start with a blank scene and mix in your favorite images, videos, SVG graphics and even smart components. Get all the power to design your own custom scene.
booxboxPreMadeScenes: With hundreds of beautiful pre-made designs you are sure to find something you like. The scene templates are preloaded with images and labels so its a great way to get started.
bootBoxAtLeastOneDiv: you must keep at least one viewable screen division
bootBoxBrowserTooSmall: your browser width or height is too small, please maximize its size and try again
bootBoxCantDeleteComp: You can`t delete a campaign that is assigned to a remote station, please fist un-assign it from Stations before you remove the campaign.
bootBoxCantDeleteTimeline: Cannot delete the last timeline, please create a new timeline before deleting this one
bootBoxDuplicateScene: are you sure you want to make a copy of this scene?
bootBoxEnterpriseUpgradeText: When you upgrade to an enterprise account you get all the benefits of the SignageStudio Pro account plus a lot more...
bootBoxEntryInValid: Invalid entry, please change the value and try again
bootBoxLoginWrongCred: You are logged with FREE SignageStudio Pro credentials and not FREE StudioLite credentials so only the Stations module is available. Be sure to create a new FREE StudioLite account to get the full experience
bootBoxNeedVerifyEmail: You must first verify your email and then reload the StudioLite
bootBoxNoFlash: Adobe Flash must be installed so you can live preview
bootBoxNoFlashv2: Adobe Flash plug-in not installed so either install it, or use the free SignagePlayer to preview the presentation
bootBoxNonAllowedCharacters: Some of the characters entered are not allowed, consider using shortening URL maker like google at: https://goo.gl
bootBoxOldBrowser: Geeesh… Your browser is a dinosaur, please use the latest version from Google chrome, Microsoft Internet Explorer or Mozilla Firefox, and we promise you will be amazed...
bootBoxRestartStations: Restart connected stations and apply all your saved work?
bootBoxSaveRemoteSrv: Save the work to remote server
bootBoxSceneMustSelectScene: You must first select or add a scene
bootBoxSceneReferItself: You cannot display a scene in a collection that refers to its own scene, that is just weird
bootBoxSceneRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this scene?
bootBoxSelectChannel: Please first select a channel to associate asset with
bootBoxSelectCompFirst: You must first select a campaign by clicking on the properties icon.
bootBoxSelectResource: Please select a resource first and try again
bootBoxSelectSceneFirst: You must first select a scene by clicking on the properties icon.
bootBoxSteps: Station will be deleted, your work will be saved to the server and your remote station (SignagePlayer) de-registered
bootBoxStudioLiteAcc: You must login with StudioLite account and not a Pro account
bootBoxSureDeleteCampaign: Are you sure you want to delete the campaign?
bootBoxSureDeleteScene: Are you sure you want to delete the scene?
bootBoxSureRemoveTimeline: Are you sure you want to remove the timeline?
bootBoxThemeReload: You may need to restart StudioLite for changes to take effect
bootBoxWizardSwitchCampaignList: To kick off the wizard, first switch back to the campaign selection page
bootBoxWrongUserOrPass: Benutzername und Passwort stimmen nicht überein.
booxboxSupportedExtensions: The only supported files are flv, mp4, jpg, png and swf. Also, make sure that the file extension is lower case such as .jpg and not .JPG
campaignModeSched: Play timelines for this campaign only on specific times. For example, play Timeline A in the morning and Timeline B at night.
campaignModeSeq: Play timelines for this campaign in a continuous loop. It is easy to setup and simple to use
confirmSteps: The following steps will take place, please confirm?
downloadAndroid: download player from Google play store:
downloadIOS: download player from the App store:
fqDesc: FasterQueue ermöglicht es Ihnen Kunden-Warteschlangen durch Benachrichtigungen zu verwalten.
fqFullScreen: Erlaubt die Vorschau von Kampagnen, Timelines und Szenen im Vollbild-Modus.
fqThemeDesc: Zwischen einem hellen oder einem dunklen Theme für StudioLite wählen
name: name
onEventTakeAction: On event take the following action
playSequential: Play this list in a sequential order
pollingDesc: Einstellen wie oft (in Sekunden) die Stationen/Player den aktuellen Status abfragen sollen
recDevice: We recommend that you purchase our device as it is optimized for the signage software. It also has a built in watch-dog and the software comes pre-installed, so you will not need to download anything at all
regDevice: register the device with your user
remoteManage: begin remote managing your device from the
removeTimelineButtonToolTip: Die ausgewählte Timeline entfernen (eine muss mindestens bestehen bleiben)
supportedFiles: (unterstützte Dateitypen: flv, mp4, jpg, png and swf)
supportedFiles2: (unterstützte Dateitypen: flv, mp4, jpg, png, swf and svg)
theRightPackage: Choose the package that is right for you
waitUploadResource: Please wait while resources are uploaded to the cloud...
wstep0:
a quick 5 minute tutorial
and we will teach you how to use StudioLite... its easy.
wstep1:
name your campaign, press [ENTER] when done
this will become useful later
when you assign your campaign to a remote screen
(a screen is also referred to as a station)
wstep10:
select resource
Add images, videos and other files
(later you can also upload file from your own PC)
wstep12:
now the resource has been added to the selected channel
just go ahead and select it to load up its properties
wstep13:
additional properties
anytime you select anything in StudioLite,
be sure to checkout the properties box
on the right for additional options and settings
wstep14:
resource duration
like here, where you can set the playback duration
of your currently selected resource,
the one that you just added
wstep15:
edit your screen division layout
use this button to edit your current screen layout
wstep16:
lets add a new screen division
it will automatically be assigned a channel on your timeline
wstep17: <text>position and size your new screen division
wstep19:
click the newly created screen division to continue
notice how the screen division was automatically assigned a new channel
wstep2: <text>select your screen orientation, vertical or horizontal</text>
wstep20:
mixing content
sometimes you want to mix resources and components into a single screen division
Scenes are perfect for that
wstep22: <text>select your newly created scene to edit it</text>
wstep23: <text>lets add a new resource or component to our scene</text>
wstep25:
edit your scene
now you can position your content
anywhere you like, resize it and change any of the properties
wstep27: <text>assign scene to channel</text>will switch back to campaigns to assign the scene to any timeline we like
wstep29:
go back to campaigns
so we can assign our newly created scene
to any timeline and channel we like
wstep32: <text>now lets add our scene to this channel</text>
wstep33: <text>select scenes to get a list of all available scenes</text>
wstep34:
select your scene
it will automatically get added to
your selected channel
wstep36:
install SignagePlayer
now you need to register a physical player
and connect it to any type of screen you like
wstep37:
choose an OS
you can pick from Android, Windows or even order our hardware (recommended)
as it comes plug and play ready to impress your audience
wstep39:
station management
here you manage remote screens
(stations) and assign them any campaign you like
wstep4:
select your screen layout
Each screen division (area) will run some different content
wstep40: <text>switch into help, we are almost done
wstep41: <text>here you will find video tutorials for additional help</text>
wstep42:
well done!
give yourself a pat on the back
wstep5:
this is your Timelines
you can create multiple timelines to play one after the other
each timeline includes one or more channels
wstep6: click to expand and see your timeline details
wstep7:
these are your channels
each channel is automatically assigned to one screen division
right now your channels are empty (no fun)
wstep8:
select next channel
with this button you can simply cycle through all
the channels of the currently selected timeline, its simple...
wstep9:
add content
Click [+] to add content to your selected channel (and matching screen division)
